head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PICCONE, DANTE N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PICCONE, DANTE N.

block.p: PICCONE-Dante N., on May 15, 2000. Beloved husband of Margaret (nee: Bocker). Loving father of Stephen, Catherine, Nancy, Elizabeth, Mary, Theodore, James and John. Devoted grandfather of 23 grandchildren. Visiting Thursday 2-4 and 7-9PM at the John J. Fox Funeral Home, Inc. 2080 Boston Post Road, Larchmont, New York. Mass on Friday 10AM at St. Augustine Church in Larchmont. Interment at Greenwood Union Cemetery in Rye, New York.
